attributes.action: allow water companies to continue or start charging churches and other religious institutions as business premises rather than as charities (NB: this is a counter petition)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Subsidising churches and religious organisations with public money is comparable to political parties using public resources to fund party business.  The water companies will fund the dispensation by charging the rest of us more.

I don't want to subsidise religious dogma and its promotion of ignorance.

Religions are per se undemocratic, acting in their own intrests and self-perservation.  Therefore they should not be funded with public money some of which at least comes from outsiders.
